quote: “The best way out is always through.”
author: Robert Frost

quote: “Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other”
author: Walter Elliot

quote: “Without a struggle, there can be no progress.”
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: “You can have data without information, but you cannot have information without data.”
author: Daniel Keys Moran

quote: “If I don't like the shape of the world around me, then I shape the world around me.”
author: Sanjay Joshi

quote: “When you come to a fork in the road, take it.”
author: Yogi Berra

quote: “All human wisdom is contained in these two words - Wait and Hope.”
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: “...remember that what has once been done may be done again.”
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: “There are no simple answers, only simple minds.”
author: Lee Surprenant

quote: “He that can have patience can have what he will.”
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: “In God we trust; all others bring data.”
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: “Information is not knowledge.  Let's not confuse the two.”
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: “Nobody should try to use data unless he has collected data.”
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: “What makes a scientist great is the care that he takes in telling you what is wrong with his results, so that you will not misuse them.”
author: W. Edwards Deming
